name: v1.7.1
body:
## OpenStudio Application Version 1.7.1

The [OpenStudio Coalition](https://openstudiocoalition.org/) is proud to announce the releases of [OpenStudio Application v1.7.1](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/releases/tag/v1.7.1). This is a patch release based on [OpenStudio SDK v3.7.0](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio/releases/tag/v3.7.0) which uses [EnergyPlus v23.2.0](https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/releases/tag/v23.2.0).

### Overview
The OpenStudio Application 1.7.1 release fixes several important bugs that were present in the 1.7.0 release.

The OpenStudio Application and OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in are funded by the OpenStudio Coalition members [The Energy Coalition](https://energycoalition.org/), [PSD](https://psdconsulting.com/), [VEIC](https://www.veic.org/), and [EffiBEM](https://www.effibem.com/). The OpenStudio Coalition has a strategic roadmap (here are the [high level results](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/roadmap/)) which prioritizes education and outreach to states, utilities, and higher education while ensuring the OpenStudio Application and OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in user interfaces continue to be free and open source. To continue our efforts and provide additional support or training, [please join us](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/openstudio_coalition/)!

### Bug Fixes:

- BCL Viewer Human Readable Descriptions by @jmarrec in [#672](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/697)
- Dragging construction set from library is very slow by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/issues/687
- Unable to edit Water Use Equipment Definition by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/685
- OpenStudio Application unusable on MacOS14 with M2 by https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/692
- Error when running Create Typical Building from Model Measures by @jmarrec and @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/699
- Local copy of BCL folder gets wiped/overwritten by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/700

### Internal/Developer changes:

- Mac CI failing on GMP by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/690

### Installation Instructions

OpenStudio Application v1.7.1 is supported on 64-bit Windows 10 – 11, OS X 11.0 and higher for x86, OS X 12.1 and higher on M1, Ubuntu 20.04, and Ubuntu 22.04. The OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in v1.7.0 requires SketchUp 2021 or higher. Refer to the [OpenStudio Application Compatibility Matrix](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/wiki/OpenStudio-Application-Version-Compatibility-Matrix#openstudio-application-version-compatibility-matrix) and the [OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in Compatibility Matrix](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/wiki/OpenStudio-SketchUp-Plug-in-Wiki#openstudio-sketchup-plug-in-version-compatibility-matrix) for more information.

- Download and run the correct [OpenStudio Application v1.7.1](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/releases/tag/v1.7.1) installer for your platform. Select components for installation. Note that OpenStudio Application is a standalone app and does not require you to install OpenStudio SDK.
- (Optional) Download the [OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in v1.7.0](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/releases/tag/v1.7.0) RBZ package. Launch SketchUp 2021 or higher and install the RBZ package.
- New - The new GitHub based Building Component Library (BCL) no longer requires an account to access online building components and measures! 
- Note that the Mac installers are currently not signed by the OpenStudio Coalition. To run these installers, the user must [ctrl-click the file and select open](https://support.apple.com/guide/mac-help/open-a-mac-app-from-an-unidentified-developer-mh40616/mac). Additionally, Mac OS may add a quarantine attribute to the dmg file that prevents it from opening.  This attribute can be removed using the command [`xattr -dr com.apple.quarantine`](https://hiringengineersbook.com/post/disable-quarantine/) at the command line.
- Note that the current version of SketchUp 2023 (Version 23.1.341) on Mac is currently affected by [OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in crashes on launch on Mac (x86_64 and ARM) with SketchUp 2023 #133](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/issues/133). For Mac users, it is advised to use SketchUp 2022 with the OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in until this issue is resolved.
- Note that [PAT](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-PAT) and [DView](https://beopt.nrel.gov/downloadDView.) are not included in either the SDK or Application installers. You will need to install PAT separately which is distributed on the [OpenStudio-PAT](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-PAT) GitHub page and DView at the [Dview home page](https://beopt.nrel.gov/downloadDView).
Installation Notes

For help with common installation problems and more detailed instructions please visit, https://openstudiocoalition.org/getting_started/getting_started/.

name: v1.7.0
body:
## OpenStudio Application Version 1.7.0

The [OpenStudio Coalition](https://openstudiocoalition.org/) is proud to announce the releases of [OpenStudio Application v1.7.0](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/releases/tag/v1.7.0) and [OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in v1.7.0](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/releases/tag/v1.7.0). These releases are based on [OpenStudio SDK v3.7.0](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio/releases/tag/v3.7.0) which uses [EnergyPlus v23.2.0](https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/releases/tag/v23.2.0).

### Overview
The OpenStudio Application 1.7.0 release updates the application to OpenStudio 3.7.0, EnergyPlus 23.2.0.  This version of the OpenStudio Application is the first version to allow access to Python Measures now supported by the OpenStudio SDK.  This functionality allows users to create and use Python Measures in OpenStudio Workflows. Opening the door to the measure writing world for Python expands the potential for users to automate and augment their workflows. If you make something amazing, please share it at https://bcl.nrel.gov/! 

The OpenStudio Application and OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in are funded by the OpenStudio Coalition members [The Energy Coalition](https://energycoalition.org/), [PSD](https://psdconsulting.com/), [VEIC](https://www.veic.org/), and [EffiBEM](https://www.effibem.com/). The OpenStudio Coalition has a strategic roadmap (here are the [high level results](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/roadmap/)) which prioritizes education and outreach to states, utilities, and higher education while ensuring the OpenStudio Application and OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in user interfaces continue to be free and open source. To continue our efforts and provide additional support or training, [please join us](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/openstudio_coalition/)!

### New Features:

- Update to OpenStudio SDK v3.7.0 and EnergyPlus v23.2.0  by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#627](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/627)
- Updated the Qt dependency from 6.3.0 to 6.6.1 by [@macumber](https://github.com/macumber) in [#650](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/650).
- A new option to create and run Python measures has been added to the OpenStudio Application by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#651](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/651). 
    - An option to re-enable the Classic CLI (which does not support Python Measures) has been added as well.
- A search bar has been added to the library tab by [@macumber](https://github.com/macumber) in [#618](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/618)
- Added geometry diagnostics in the geometry preview: incorrectly oriented surfaces, non convex spaces by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#630](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/630)
- Allow searching and bulk updating output variables by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#623](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/623) and [@macumber](https://github.com/macumber) in [#631](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/631)

### Bug Fixes:

- Fix the crash in schedules view by [@macumber](https://github.com/macumber) in [#614](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/614)
- Fix [#482](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/issues/482) - SwimmingPool:Indoor icon + policy and implement a way to deal with ModelObjects having a model-dependent parameter by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#621](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/621)
- Fix [#560](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/issues/560) - Refactor HVACSystems view to hide unavailable controls, allow zooming display on VRF + Refrigeration tab by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#622](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/622)
- Fix [#238](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/issues/238) - Add a search bar for the Output Variable list, allow displaying only selected, bulk setting reporting frequency by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#623](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/623)
- Fix [#638](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/issues/638) - Make links clickable for measure descriptions by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#639](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/639)
- Install the OpenStudio Results measure as a backup to the BCL by [@macumber](https://github.com/macumber) in [#642](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/642)
- Fix bug when cloning a story with windows by [@macumber](https://github.com/macumber) in [#643](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/643)
- Update mechanical ventilation outdoor air method combo box by [@eringold](https://github.com/eringold) in [#646](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/646)
- Partially address Mac hang issue [#659](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/issues/659) by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#663](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/663)

### Internal/Developer changes:

- Fix MacOS CI by [@macumber](https://github.com/macumber) in [#624](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/624)
- Geometry Preview refactor - separate into several files, allow running in browser directly by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#628](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/628)
- Update to OpenStudio SDK 3.7.0-alpha (latest nightly build) by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#627](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/627)
- Use the GitHub hosted macos-13 runners by [@macumber](https://github.com/macumber) in [#647](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/647)
- Re-enable tar.gz for MacOS by [@macumber](https://github.com/macumber) in [#654](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/654)
- Properly find libruby/libpythonengine on macOS by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#664](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/664)
- Test SDK CLI from installers from another C++ CI run by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#666](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/666)
- Redo app build caching by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#667](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/667)
- 1.7.0 rc2 fixes by [@jmarrec](https://github.com/jmarrec) in [#676](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/676)

### Installation Instructions

OpenStudio Application v1.7.0 is supported on 64-bit Windows 10 – 11, OS X 11.0 and higher for x86, OS X 12.1 and higher on M1, Ubuntu 20.04, and Ubuntu 22.04. The OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in v1.7.0 requires SketchUp 2021 or higher. Refer to the [OpenStudio Application Compatibility Matrix](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/wiki/OpenStudio-Application-Version-Compatibility-Matrix#openstudio-application-version-compatibility-matrix) and the [OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in Compatibility Matrix](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/wiki/OpenStudio-SketchUp-Plug-in-Wiki#openstudio-sketchup-plug-in-version-compatibility-matrix) for more information.

- Download and run the correct [OpenStudio Application v1.7.0](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/releases/tag/v1.7.0) installer for your platform. Select components for installation. Note that OpenStudio Application is a standalone app and does not require you to install OpenStudio SDK.
- (Optional) Download the [OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in v1.7.0](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/releases/tag/v1.7.0) RBZ package. Launch SketchUp 2021 or higher and install the RBZ package.
- New - The new GitHub based Building Component Library (BCL) no longer requires an account to access online building components and measures! 
- Note that the Mac installers are currently not signed by the OpenStudio Coalition. To run these installers, the user must [ctrl-click the file and select open](https://support.apple.com/guide/mac-help/open-a-mac-app-from-an-unidentified-developer-mh40616/mac). Additionally, Mac OS may add a quarantine attribute to the dmg file that prevents it from opening.  This attribute can be removed using the command [`xattr -dr com.apple.quarantine`](https://hiringengineersbook.com/post/disable-quarantine/) at the command line.
- Note that the current version of SketchUp 2023 (Version 23.1.341) on Mac is currently affected by [OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in crashes on launch on Mac (x86_64 and ARM) with SketchUp 2023 #133](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/issues/133). For Mac users, it is advised to use SketchUp 2022 with the OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in until this issue is resolved.
- Note that [PAT](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-PAT) and [DView](https://beopt.nrel.gov/downloadDView.) are not included in either the SDK or Application installers. You will need to install PAT separately which is distributed on the [OpenStudio-PAT](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-PAT) GitHub page and DView at the [Dview home page](https://beopt.nrel.gov/downloadDView).
Installation Notes

For help with common installation problems and more detailed instructions please visit, https://openstudiocoalition.org/getting_started/getting_started/.

name: v1.7.0-rc2
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix the crash in schedules view by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/614
* Add search bar to OSCollapsibleItemList by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/618
* Fix MacOS CI by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/624
* Fix #482 - SwimmingPool:Indoor icon + policy and implement a way to deal with ModelObjects having a model-dependent parameter by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/621
* Fix #560 - Refactor HVACSystems view to hide unavailable controls, allow zooming display on VRF + Refrigeration tab by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/622
* Fix #238 - Add a search bar for the Output Variable list, allow displaying only selected, bulk setting reporting frequency by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/623
* Update to OpenStudio SDK 3.7.0-alpha (latest nightly build) by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/627
* Geometry Preview refactor - separate into several files, allow running in browser directly by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/628
* New Geometry Diagnostics in the Geometry Preview: Detect incorrectly oriented surfaces in spaces, non convex spaces by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/630
* Update variables layout by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/631
* Update to OpenStudio 3.7.0-alpha based on EnergyPlus v23.2.0 official by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/635
* Update to OpenStudio 3.7.0-rc1 by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/636
* Disable TLS_VERIFY for conan cmake for windows CI runner by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/637
* Fix #638 - Make links clickable for measure descriptions by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/639
* Update to OpenStudio v3.7.0 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/644
* Install the OpenStudio Results measure as a backup to the BCL by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/642
* Update the application version by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/645
* Update OSM versions to 3.7.0 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/648
* Fix bug when cloning a story with windows by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/643
* Use the GitHub hosted macos-13 runners by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/647
* Update to Qt 6.6.1 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/650
* Add support for Python Measures by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/651
* Re-enable tar.gz for MacOS by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/654
* Update mechanical ventilation outdoor air method combo box by @eringold in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/646
* Support new CLI output by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/662
* Test SDK CLI from installers from another C++ CI run by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/666
* #657 - Properly find libruby/libpythonengine on macOS by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/664
* Redo app build caching by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/667
* Bad workaround for #659 by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/663
* 1.7.0 rc2 fixes by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/676


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/compare/v1.6.0...v1.7.0-rc2

name: v1.7.0-rc1
body:
The OpenStudio Coalition is proud to release the first release candidate for OpenStudio Application 1.7.0, which has updates to OpenStudio SDK 3.7.0, EnergyPlus 23.2.0.

As a reminder we have strategic roadmap (here are the [high level results](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/roadmap/)) which prioritizes education and outreach to states, utilities, and higher education. All this has been funded by founding OpenStudio Coalition members [The Energy Coalition](https://energycoalition.org/), [PSD](https://psdconsulting.com/), [VEIC](https://www.veic.org/), and [EffiBEM](https://www.effibem.com/). To continue our efforts and provide additional support and training, [please join us](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/openstudio_coalition/)!

## Testing: Call for help from the community

**Please take a few minutes of your time to help us test this Release candidate by going to [this issue](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/issues/653)**

## What's Changed

* Merge develop to master for 1.5.0 release by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/589
* Send tab name instead of tab index and fix CORS issue by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/607
* Don't crash if LocalBCL is corrupt by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/609
* Update to OS 3.6.1 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/610
* Merge for 1.6.0 release by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/611

* Fix MacOS CI by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/624
* Fix #482 - SwimmingPool:Indoor icon + policy and implement a way to deal with ModelObjects having a model-dependent parameter by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/621
* Fix #560 - Refactor HVACSystems view to hide unavailable controls, allow zooming display on VRF + Refrigeration tab by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/622
* Fix #238 - Add a search bar for the Output Variable list, allow displaying only selected, bulk setting reporting frequency by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/623
* Update to OpenStudio SDK 3.7.0-alpha (latest nightly build) by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/627

* New Geometry Diagnostics in the Geometry Preview: Detect incorrectly oriented surfaces in spaces, non convex spaces by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/630

* Update to OpenStudio v3.7.0 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/644
* Install the OpenStudio Results measure as a backup to the BCL by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/642

* Update OSM versions to 3.7.0 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/648

name: v1.6.0
body:
The OpenStudio Application 1.6.0 release updates the application to [OpenStudio 3.6.1](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio/releases/tag/v3.6.1), [EnergyPlus 23.1.0](https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/releases/tag/v23.1.0).  

Beyond these regular updates and bug fixes, this version of the OpenStudio Application includes a new feature to reorder HVACComponents on a loop using drag and drop.  This new feature saves time by moving components around without having to delete and re-add them.  

## What's Changed

**New Features**:

* **Update to [OpenStudio 3.6.1](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio/releases/tag/v3.6.1) and [EnergyPlus 23.1.0](https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/releases/tag/v23.1.0)**
* Fix #145 - Allow reordering HVACComponent on Loop via drag and drop by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/599

**Bug fixes**:

* Fix #597 - ZoomOutButton displays 5.2 times by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/598
* Fix #594 - Openstudio Application crashes after selecting calendar year and switching to/from "Utility Bills" by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/596
* Fixes the map not showing up in FloorspaceJS by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/607
* Don't crash if LocalBCL is corrupt by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/609

**Internal/Developer changes**:

* Remove ccache on Windows runners by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/604
* Update to Google Analytics 4 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/601
* Update to windows-2022 runner and removed the windows-2019 runner by @jmarrec 
* Update Conan to 1.53.0 by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/595

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/compare/v1.5.0...v1.6.0

name: v1.5.0
body:
The OpenStudio Coalition is proud to release OpenStudio Application 1.5.0, which has updates to OpenStudio 3.5.1, EnergyPlus 22.2.0.

As a reminder we have strategic roadmap (here are the [high level results](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/roadmap/)) which prioritizes education and outreach to states, utilities, and higher education. All this has been funded by founding OpenStudio Coalition members [The Energy Coalition](https://energycoalition.org/), [PSD](https://psdconsulting.com/), [VEIC](https://www.veic.org/), and [EffiBEM](https://www.effibem.com/). To continue our efforts and provide additional support and training, [please join us](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/openstudio_coalition/)!


## What's Changed

**New Features**:

* **Update to OpenStudio SDK v3.5.1 and EnergyPlus v22.2.0**
* Add SetpointManager:SystemNodeReset:Temperature and SetpointManager:SystemNodeReset:Humidity by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/569
* Add tab tracking with google analytics by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/564
    * Tab tracking is opt-in, and can be disabled at any time in the OpenStudio Application settings. The OpenStudio Coalition aims to collect anonymous usage statistics to help improve the OpenStudio Application. You can refer to our [privacy policy](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/privacy_policy/) for more information.
* Style updates by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/540
* Note: A new component called "Python bindings" is available for selection in the binary installers. For now, it will only install the python bindings in your application's folder, since support for Python Measures is still experimental in the OS SDK.
* Update standards (add 90.1-2016 and 90.1-2019 library files) by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/587

**Bug fixes**:

* Fix #551 - Allow connecting a VRF Terminal from "MyModel" to a VRF System by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/552
* Parent page to view by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/548
* Fix #549 - Update hvac_library.osm for  ZoneHVACTerminalUnitVariableRefrigerantFlow by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/550
* Update other uses of OSWebEnginePage by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/558
* Geometry preview - fix incorrect variable scope by @antoine-galataud in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/553
* Allow deleting subsurfaces and improve app speed by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/582
* Only set error to true on failed simulation by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/580
* render scene when camera option changes by @antoine-galataud in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/586
* Fix dup images, fix measure manager bug, show beginning of long strings in QLineEdit by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/588


**Internal/Developer changes**:

* Enable C++20 and use nighty build of OpenStudio (3.5.0-alpha, E+ 22.2.0) by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/566
* Bump hvac library to 3.5.0 by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/567
* Bump all osms but hvac_library to 3.5.0 by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/568
* Run Clang checks: `performance-for-range-copy` `readability-qualified-auto`, `modernize-use-auto`, `modernize-use-using -fix` by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/573
* Bump cppcheck from 2.3 to 2.9 by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/570
* Adding Mac Mini runner for arm64 (M1) packages by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/578
* Update to OS SDK 3.5.0-rc1 by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/572
* Update SHAs to final 3.5.0 release by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/576
* Upgrade OS SDK to 3.5.1-rc2 by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/583
* Update to OpenStudio 3.5.1 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/584

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/compare/v1.4.0...v1.5.0

body:
The OpenStudio Coalition is proud to release OpenStudio Application 1.4.0, which has updates to OpenStudio 3.4.0, EnergyPlus 22.1.0.

As a reminder we have strategic roadmap (here are the [high level results](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/roadmap/)) which prioritizes education and outreach to states, utilities, and higher education. All this has been funded by founding OpenStudio Coalition members [The Energy Coalition](https://energycoalition.org/), [PSD](https://psdconsulting.com/), [VEIC](https://www.veic.org/), and [EffiBEM](https://www.effibem.com/). To continue our efforts and provide additional support and training, [please join us](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/openstudio_coalition/)!
 

## What's Changed

**New Features**:

* **Update to OpenStudio SDK v3.4.0 and EnergyPlus v22.1.0**
* We have bumped the Qt dependency from 5.15 to 6.3.0. As a result **Ubuntu-18.04 is no longer officially supported.**
* **This is the first release that includes an Apple M1 (arm64) package**
* **Internationalization:** translate first tab of the app to English, French, Spanish, Chinese, Greek, Polish, Catalan, Farsi-Persian, Hindi, Japanese, Italian, German, Vietnamese by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/354
* **Option to enable Verbose output to run tab** + styled fallback when no socket by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/513
* filter scene by air loop by @antoine-galataud in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/497
* **render 3D scene on demand** by @antoine-galataud in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/510
* #479 - **Find outdated measures in your local BCL folder compared to Online BCL** by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/517
* **Enable loop clone** by @eringold in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/488

**Bug Fixes**:

* Fix #477 - SubSurface types don't line up with many subsurfaces in space by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/515
* Fix #476 - Apply to selected does not work on ThermalZone Cooling or Heating Size Parameters by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/516
* Fix #428 - Redo dependent dropdowns for Standards Template / Building Type / Space Type by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/514
* Fixes #494 - Opening simulation run directory fails by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/502
* Allow simulation if run socket cannot be opened by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/484
* Workaround for #521: download the missing vcomp140.dll by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/525
* [#501] DesignHeatRecoveryWaterFlowRate field by @j-lorrey in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/532
* 538 crashes by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/539
* Fix #522 - Too many new lines in Verbose output on the Run tab on Windows by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/543
* Fix #535 - Combobox offset when using fractional scaling by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/544
 
**Internal/Developer changes**:

* [#230] Remove explicit constructor cppcheck suppression by @j-lorrey in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/511
* Bump SDK to v3.4.0 official by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/518
* Upgrade to Qt 6 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/461
* Consolidate settings into OSWebEnginePage by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/504
* Fix #526 : do not use OpenStudioApp in openstudio_lib by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/527
* Update Copyright to 2022 by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/531
* #521 - Udpate SHA for OS SDK 3.4.0 on Windows by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/533
* Start at adjusting dependencies to match what windeployqt suggests by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/537

## New Contributors
* @luisclv made their first contribution in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/382
* @kentakahas made their first contribution in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/388
* @eringold made their first contribution in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/488
* @j-lorrey made their first contribution in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/511

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/compare/v1.3.1...v1.4.0

name: OpenStudioApplication v1.4.0-rc2
body:
The OpenStudio Coalition is proud to release the first release candidate for OpenStudio Application 1.4.0, which has updates to OpenStudio 3.4.0, EnergyPlus 22.1.0.

As a reminder we have strategic roadmap (here are the [high level results](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/roadmap/)) which prioritizes education and outreach to states, utilities, and higher education. All this has been funded by founding OpenStudio Coalition members [The Energy Coalition](https://energycoalition.org/), [PSD](https://psdconsulting.com/), [VEIC](https://www.veic.org/), and [EffiBEM](https://www.effibem.com/). To continue our efforts and provide additional support and training, [please join us](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/openstudio_coalition/)!
 

## What's Changed

**New Features**:

* **Update to OpenStudio SDK v3.4.0 and EnergyPlus v22.1.0**
* We have bumped the Qt dependency from 5.15 to 6.3.0. As a result **Ubuntu-18.04 is no longer officially supported.**
* **This is the first release that includes an Apple M1 (arm64) package**
* **Internationalization:** translate first tab of the app to English, French, Spanish, Chinese, Greek, Polish, Catalan, Farsi-Persian, Hindi, Japanese, Italian, German, Vietnamese by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/354
* **Option to enable Verbose output to run tab** + styled fallback when no socket by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/513
* filter scene by air loop by @antoine-galataud in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/497
* **render 3D scene on demand** by @antoine-galataud in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/510
* #479 - **Find outdated measures in your local BCL folder compared to Online BCL** by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/517
* **Enable loop clone** by @eringold in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/488

**Bug Fixes**:

* Fix #477 - SubSurface types don't line up with many subsurfaces in space by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/515
* Fix #476 - Apply to selected does not work on ThermalZone Cooling or Heating Size Parameters by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/516
* Fix #428 - Redo dependent dropdowns for Standards Template / Building Type / Space Type by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/514
* Fixes #494 - Opening simulation run directory fails by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/502
* Allow simulation if run socket cannot be opened by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/484
* Workaround for #521: download the missing vcomp140.dll by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/525
* [#501] DesignHeatRecoveryWaterFlowRate field by @j-lorrey in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/532
* 538 crashes by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/539

 
**Internal/Developer changes**:

* [#230] Remove explicit constructor cppcheck suppression by @j-lorrey in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/511
* Bump SDK to v3.4.0 official by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/518
* Upgrade to Qt 6 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/461
* Consolidate settings into OSWebEnginePage by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/504
* Fix #526 : do not use OpenStudioApp in openstudio_lib by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/527
* Update Copyright to 2022 by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/531
* #521 - Udpate SHA for OS SDK 3.4.0 on Windows by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/533
* Start at adjusting dependencies to match what windeployqt suggests by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/537

## New Contributors
* @luisclv made their first contribution in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/382
* @kentakahas made their first contribution in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/388
* @eringold made their first contribution in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/488
* @j-lorrey made their first contribution in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/511

name: OpenstudioApplication v1.4.0-rc1
body:
The OpenStudio Coalition is proud to release the first release candidate for OpenStudio Application 1.4.0, which has updates to OpenStudio 3.4.0, EnergyPlus 22.1.0.

As a reminder we have strategic roadmap (here are the [high level results](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/roadmap/)) which prioritizes education and outreach to states, utilities, and higher education. All this has been funded by founding OpenStudio Coalition members [The Energy Coalition](https://energycoalition.org/), [PSD](https://psdconsulting.com/), [VEIC](https://www.veic.org/), and [EffiBEM](https://www.effibem.com/). To continue our efforts and provide additional support and training, [please join us](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/openstudio_coalition/)!
 

## What's Changed

**New Features**:

* **Update to OpenStudio SDK v3.4.0 and EnergyPlus v22.1.0**
* We have bumped the Qt dependency from 5.15 to 6.3.0. As a result **Ubuntu-18.04 is no longer officially supported.**
* **This is the first release that includes an Apple M1 (arm64) package**
* **Internationalization:** translate first tab of the app to English, French, Spanish, Chinese, Greek, Polish, Catalan, Farsi-Persian, Hindi, Japanese, Italian, German, Vietnamese by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/354
* **Option to enable Verbose output to run tab** + styled fallback when no socket by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/513
* filter scene by air loop by @antoine-galataud in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/497
* **render 3D scene on demand** by @antoine-galataud in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/510
* #479 - **Find outdated measures in your local BCL folder compared to Online BCL** by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/517
* **Enable loop clone** by @eringold in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/488

**Bug Fixes**:

* Fix #477 - SubSurface types don't line up with many subsurfaces in space by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/515
* Fix #476 - Apply to selected does not work on ThermalZone Cooling or Heating Size Parameters by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/516
* Fix #428 - Redo dependent dropdowns for Standards Template / Building Type / Space Type by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/514
* Fixes #494 - Opening simulation run directory fails by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/502
* Allow simulation if run socket cannot be opened by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/484

**Internal/Developer changes**:

* [#230] Remove explicit constructor cppcheck suppression by @j-lorrey in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/511
* Bump SDK to v3.4.0 official by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/518
* Upgrade to Qt 6 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/461
* Consolidate settings into OSWebEnginePage by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/504

## New Contributors
* @luisclv made their first contribution in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/382
* @kentakahas made their first contribution in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/388

name: OpenstudioApplication v1.3.0
body:
The OpenStudio Coalition is proud to release the OpenStudio Application 1.3.0, which has updates to OpenStudio 3.3.0, EnergyPlus 9.6.0, and the new GitHub based BCL. This release also has digital code signing for Windows and a variety of bug fixes and new features. We’ve given the OpenStudio Coalition a new brand and logo. We’ve also created a strategic roadmap (here are the [high level results](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/roadmap/)) which prioritizes education and outreach to states, utilities, and higher education. All this has been funded by founding OpenStudio Coalition members The Energy Coalition, PSD, VEIC, and EffiBEM. To continue our efforts and provide additional support and training, [please join us](https://openstudiocoalition.org/about/openstudio_coalition/)!

Notable changes in 1.3.0 include:

- Update to OpenStudio SDK v3.3.0 and EnergyPlus v9.6
- Update to use the new GitHub based BCL
- Update to use new OpenStudio Coalition branding and logos
- Update to sign Windows installer with EV digital certificate
- Add AirLoopHVACUnitaryHeatPumpAirToAirMultiSpeed to library
- Add CoilCoolingDXVariableSpeed to library
- Add new adjacency checker to View Model - contributed by [Nick Schrader](https://github.com/nschrader)
- Allow the Apply Measures dialog box to be resized
- Allow WaterUseConnections to be edited
- Fix bug that did not allow editing of all fields when using inspector
- Fix bug that added humidistats to Thermal Zones
- Fix bug that did not show weather file when first opening a model

## What's Changed
* Add CLA md and workflow by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/440
* Os 330 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/443

* Fix #383 - No Icon for ZoneHVACTerminalUnitVariableRefrigerantFlow when placed on AirLoopHVACOutdoorAirSystem by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/384
* Clean up BCL dialog and remove auth keys by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/447
* Minor adjustments to clang tidy file by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/459
* Fix #385 - Change action to ruby/setup-ruby by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/454

* Fix #431 - Add AirLoopHVACUnitaryHeatPumpAirToAirMultiSpeed in library by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/453
* Update logos for the OSApp by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/457
* Fix #301 -  Add CoilCoolingDXVariableSpeed to hvac_library and MainRightColumnController by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/455
* 445 inspector gadget all fields by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/448
* Fix #427 - Allow Apply Measures dialog box to be resized/maximized by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/451
* Update to official OS 3.3 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/463
* Fixes #464 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/465
* Osc package by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/462
* Fix #131 - Allow to edit WaterUseConnections by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/460
* Fix #436 and #449 - Policy updates by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/450
* Adjacency checker by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/467
* Adjacency Checker by @nschrader in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/439
* Add more logging around saving files and handle case where save as fails by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/471
* Fixes #468 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/469

name: OpenstudioApplication v1.3.0-rc1
body:
## What's Changed
* Add CLA md and workflow by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/440
* Os 330 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/443
* Add Clang tidy file by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/406
* Fix #383 - No Icon for ZoneHVACTerminalUnitVariableRefrigerantFlow when placed on AirLoopHVACOutdoorAirSystem by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/384
* Clean up BCL dialog and remove auth keys by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/447
* Minor adjustments to clang tidy file by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/459
* Fix #385 - Change action to ruby/setup-ruby by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/454
* Update Copyright to 2020-2021 + add OSC logo to AboutBox by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/458
* Fix #431 - Add AirLoopHVACUnitaryHeatPumpAirToAirMultiSpeed in library by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/453
* Update logos for the OSApp by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/457
* Fix #301 -  Add CoilCoolingDXVariableSpeed to hvac_library and MainRightColumnController by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/455
* 445 inspector gadget all fields by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/448
* Fix #427 - Allow Apply Measures dialog box to be resized/maximized by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/451
* Update to official OS 3.3 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/463
* Fixes #464 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/465
* Osc package by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/462
* Fix #131 - Allow to edit WaterUseConnections by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/460
* Fix #436 and #449 - Policy updates by @jmarrec in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/450
* Adjacency checker by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/467
* Adjacency Checker by @nschrader in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/439
* Add more logging around saving files and handle case where save as fails by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/471
* Fixes #468 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/469
* Update to use release cert and add rc1 by @macumber in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/474

## New Contributors
* @nschrader made their first contribution in https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/pull/439

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/compare/v1.2.1...v1.3.0-rc1

name: OpenstudioApplication v1.2.1
body:
The OpenStudio Application version 1.2.1 is a patch update to the 1.2.0 version.  There is a corresponding [1.2.1 release for the OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/releases/tag/v1.2.1).  The OpenStudio Application 1.2.1 patch fixes a the following bugs and adds the following new features:

- Fixes crash in OpenStudio Application GridView for models with a large number of Spaces or ThermalZones 
- Fixes crash in OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in when using the ThermalZone inspector
- Adds Exterior Equipment functionality to OpenStudio Application
- Adds simple search in geometry preview to OpenStudio Application - contributed by [Antoine Galataud](https://github.com/antoine-galataud)

name: OpenstudioApplication v1.2.0
body:
# OpenStudio Application Version 1.2.0 and OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in Version 1.2.0

*Release Notes - 2021-06-08*

The [OpenStudio Coalition](https://openstudiocoalition.org/) is proud to announce the releases of [OpenStudio Application v1.2.0](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/releases/tag/v1.2.0) and [OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in v1.2.0](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/releases/tag/v1.2.0). These releases are based on [OpenStudio SDK v3.2.0](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio/releases/tag/v3.2.0) which uses [EnergyPlus v9.5.0](https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/releases/tag/v9.5.0).

# Overview

Following an important announcement related to future development of the OpenStudio Application released in September 2019 ([A Shift in BTO’s BEM Strategy: A New Future for the OpenStudio Application](https://www.openstudio.net/new-future-for-openstudio-application)), this release marks the second major release of the OpenStudio Application and OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in by the OpenStudio Coalition.
Going forward, the OpenStudio SDK will continue to be distributed and released by NREL and U.S. DOE two times per year, in April and October. The OpenStudio SDK includes the C++ SDK, Ruby API, Command Line Interface (CLI), OpenStudio Standards, and integrated EnergyPlus and Radiance packages. 

The OpenStudio Coalition will be distributing and releasing new versions of the OpenStudio Application and OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in as new versions of the OpenStudio SDK are released. Development of the OpenStudio Application has moved to [openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication) and development of the OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in has moved to [openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin).
 
OpenStudio Application Version 1.2.0 and OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in Version 1.2.0 are the second major releases of these programs distributed by the OpenStudio Coalition. Notable changes include:

- **Update to OpenStudio SDK v3.2.0 and EnergyPlus v9.5.0**
- **Update to Ruby 2.7.2 for compatibility with SketchUp 2021**
    - OpenStudio Application v1.2.0 is compatible with SketchUp 2021
    - OpenStudio Application v1.1.0 is compatible with SketchUp 2019-2020
- **Improvements to GridView performance for larger models**
    - Displaying the Surfaces tab for example is now 3 times faster
- Add support for ZoneHVAC:CoolingPanel:RadiantConvective:Water, Humidifier:Stream:Gas, Fan:ComponentModel, Output:Diagnostics, and Output:Table:SummaryReports objects
- Fix installer and geometry tab on Ubuntu
- Add ability to start app on specific tab using the `OPENSTUDIO_APPLICATION_START_TAB_INDEX` environment variable (Feature supported by Ladybug Tools)
- Updated FloorspaceJS to latest version, and ThreeJS to version r98
- Update to supported JFrog and NREL conan remotes

Note that [PAT](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-PAT) and [DView](https://beopt.nrel.gov/downloadDView) are not included in either the SDK or Application installers. You will need to install PAT separately which is distributed on the [OpenStudio-PAT GitHub page](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-PAT) and DView at the [Dview home page](https://beopt.nrel.gov/downloadDView).

#  Installation Notes

OpenStudio Application v1.2.0 is supported on 64-bit Windows 7 – 10, OS X 10.12 – 10.15, Ubuntu 18.04, and Ubuntu 20.04. The OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in v1.2.0 requires OpenStudio Application v1.2.0 and SketchUp 2021. 

Refer to the [OpenStudio Application Compatibility Matrix](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/wiki/OpenStudio-Application-Version-Compatibility-Matrix) and the [OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in Compatibility Matrix](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/wiki/OpenStudio-SketchUp-Plug-in-Wiki) for more information.

## Installation Steps

- Download and run the correct [OpenStudio Application v1.2.0 installer](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/releases/tag/v1.2.0) for your platform. Select components for installation. Note that OpenStudio Application is a standalone app and does not require you to install OpenStudio SDK.
- (Optional) Download the OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in v1.2.0 RBZ package. Launch SketchUp 2021 and install the RBZ package.
- (Optional) Setup a Building Component Library (BCL) account to access online building components and measures. 

For help with common installation problems and more detailed instructions please visit, [https://openstudiocoalition.org/getting_started/getting_started/](https://openstudiocoalition.org/getting_started/getting_started/).

name: OpenstudioApplication v1.1.0
body:
# OpenStudio Application Version 1.1.0 

The [OpenStudio Coalition](https://openstudiocoalition.org/) is proud to announce the releases of [OpenStudio Application v1.1.0](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/releases/tag/v1.1.0) and [OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in v1.1.0](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/releases/tag/v1.1.0). These releases are based on [OpenStudio SDK v3.1.0](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio/releases/tag/v3.1.0) which uses [EnergyPlus v.9.4.0](https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/releases/tag/v9.4.0).

# Overview

Following an important announcement related to future development of the OpenStudio Application released in September 2019 ([A Shift in BTO’s BEM Strategy: A New Future for the OpenStudio Application](https://www.openstudio.net/new-future-for-openstudio-application)), this release marks the first major release of the OpenStudio Application and OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in by the OpenStudio Coalition.
Going forward, the OpenStudio SDK will continue to be distributed and released by NREL and U.S. DOE two times per year, in April and October. The OpenStudio SDK includes the C++ SDK, Ruby API, Command Line Interface (CLI), OpenStudio Standards, and integrated EnergyPlus and Radiance packages. 

The OpenStudio Coalition will be distributing and releasing new versions of the OpenStudio Application and OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in as new versions of the OpenStudio SDK are released. Development of the OpenStudio Application has moved to [https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication) and development of the OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in has moved to [https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin).
 
OpenStudio Application Version 1.1.0 and OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in Version 1.1.0 are the first major releases of these programs distributed by the OpenStudio Coalition. Notable changes include:

- Update to OpenStudio SDK v3.1.0 and EnergyPlus v9.4
- Update to QT 5.15 LTS
- Add Continuous Integration to OpenStudio Application repo
- Add support for WaterCooled VRFs in OpenStudio Application
- Add new fields for SimulationControl: 
    - DoHVACSizingSimulationforSizingPeriods
    - MaximumNumberofHVACSizingSimulationPasses
- Add OutputJSON to the OpenStudioApplication
- Add ability to edit Schedule Set Name from Space Types tab
- Add check for update to the OpenStudio Application
- Fix crash on save when directory is open in Explorer on Windows
- Fix bugs related to north angle in geometry preview tab
- Fix startup dialog bugs in OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in

Note that [PAT](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-PAT) and [DView](https://beopt.nrel.gov/downloadDView) are not included in either the SDK or Application installers. You will need to install PAT separately which is distributed on the [OpenStudio-PAT GitHub page](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-PAT) and DView at the [Dview home page](https://beopt.nrel.gov/downloadDView).

#  Installation Notes

OpenStudio Application v1.1.0 is supported on 64-bit Windows 7 – 10, OS X 10.12 – 10.15, and Ubuntu 18.04. The OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in v1.1.0 requires OpenStudio Application v1.1.0 and SketchUp 2019 - 2020. Refer to the [OpenStudio Application Compatibility Matrix](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/OpenStudioApplication/wiki/OpenStudio-Application-Version-Compatibility-Matrix) and the [OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in Compatibility Matrix](https://github.com/openstudiocoalition/openstudio-sketchup-plugin/wiki/OpenStudio-SketchUp-Plug-in-Wiki) for more information.

## Installation Steps

- Download and run the correct OpenStudio Application v1.1.0 installer for your platform. Select components for installation. Note that OpenStudio Application is a standalone app and does not require you to install OpenStudio SDK.
- (Optional) Download the OpenStudio SketchUp Plug-in v1.1.0 RBZ package. Launch SketchUp 2019 - 2020 and install the RBZ package.
- (Optional) Setup a Building Component Library (BCL) account to access online building components and measures. 

For help with common installation problems and more detailed instructions please visit, [https://openstudiocoalition.org/getting_started/getting_started/](https://openstudiocoalition.org/getting_started/getting_started/).

name: OpenStudio Application v1.0.1

name: OpenStudio Application v1.0.0
body:
# OpenStudio Application Version 1.0.0

_Release Notes - 4/24/2020_

These release notes describe version 1.0.0 of the OpenStudio Application developed by the National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL), Buildings and Thermal Systems, Commercial Buildings Research Group, Tools Development Section, and associated collaborators. The notes are organized into the following sections:

-  Overview
-  Where to Find OpenStudio Documentation
-  Installation Notes
-  OpenStudio Application: Changelog


# Overview

Following an important announcement related to future development of the OpenStudio Application released in September 2019 ([A Shift in BTO’s BEM Strategy: A New Future for the OpenStudio Application](https://www.openstudio.net/new-future-for-openstudio-application)), **this release marks the last NREL planned software distribution of the OpenStudio Application.**
Below is the list of components that is included in this SDK installer:

__**OpenStudio Application 1.0.0**__
- Application Resources (Includes EnergyPlus & Radiance)
- Ruby API
- Command Line Interface (CLI)
- OpenStudio Application

**Note** that [PAT](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-PAT) and [DView]( https://beopt.nrel.gov/downloadDView.) are not included in the OpenStudio Application installer. You will need to install PAT separately which is distributed on the [OpenStudio-PAT](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio-PAT) GitHub page and DView at the [Dview home page]( https://beopt.nrel.gov/downloadDView).

# Where to Find OpenStudio Documentation

- OpenStudio release documentation, including these release notes, tutorials, and other user documentation, is available at [https://www.openstudio.net/](https://www.openstudio.net/.)
- C++ API documentation is available at [https://openstudio-sdk-documentation.s3.amazonaws.com/index.html](https://openstudio-sdk-documentation.s3.amazonaws.com/index.html)
- OpenStudio Application Developer docs at [https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/wiki](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/wiki)
- OpenStudio Application User docs at [https://nrel.github.io/OpenStudioApplication/](https://nrel.github.io/OpenStudioApplication/)
- Measure development documentation is available at [http://nrel.github.io/OpenStudio-user-documentation/reference/measure_writing_guide/](http://nrel.github.io/OpenStudio-user-documentation/reference/measure_writing_guide/ )
- A roadmap for planned features is available at http://nrel.github.io/OpenStudio-user-documentation/getting_started/roadmap/.


# Installation Notes

OpenStudio Application 1.0.0 is supported on 64-bit Windows 7 – 10, OS X 10.12 – 10.15, and Ubuntu 18.04.

OpenStudio Application 1.0.0 supports [EnergyPlus Release 9.3](https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus/releases/tag/v9.3.0), which is bundled with the OpenStudio installer. 

OpenStudio Application 1.0.0 supports Radiance 5.0.a.12, which is bundled with the OpenStudio installer; users no longer must install Radiance separately, and OpenStudio will use the included Radiance version regardless of any other versions that may be installed on the system. 

OpenStudio Application 1.0.0 now uses **Ruby 2.5.5** as the supported version (2.2.4 previously).


## Installation Steps

- Download and install [OpenStudioApplication](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/). Select components for installation. Note that OpenStudio Application is a standalone app and does not require you to install OpenStudio SDK.
- Setup a Building Component Library (BCL) account to access online building components and measures. View instructions on how to setup your account and configure the key in OpenStudio.
- The [OpenStudio Application SketchUp Plug-in](https://github.com/NREL/openstudio-sketchup-plugin) requires SketchUp 2019 (not available for Linux). The OpenStudio Application SketchUp Plug-in does not support older versions of SketchUp. SketchUp must be installed before OpenStudio Application to automatically activate the plugin. If you install SketchUp after OpenStudio Application, simply rerun the OpenStudio Application installer. Please see the installation guide on [OpenStudio Application SketchUp Plugin](https://github.com/NREL/openstudio-sketchup-plugin). 

# OpenStudio Application: Changelog

The 1.0.0 is a major release
The 1.0.0 release updates OpenStudio SDK to 3.0.0 and to use EnergyPlus 9.3. This update includes several new features, performance improvements, and bug fixes. You can find the list of Pull Requests that got into this release [here](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pulls?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=is%3Apr+is%3Aclosed+created%3A2019-12-07..2020-04-20+).


## New Features and Fixes

These are specific to the Application. Please refer to the release notes for OpenStudio SDK for 3.0.0 release to see what has 
changed with the SDK. 

* Updated [OpenStudio SDK](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudio) from v2.9.1 to v3.0.0

* Updated [EnergyPlus](https://github.com/NREL/EnergyPlus) from v9.2.0 to v9.3.0

* [#100](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/100) - Properly register the OS:Construction:AirBoundary in OS App

* [#98](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/98) - Make Geometry Editor work on Ubuntu (including in local build folder)

* [#94](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/94) - Add cmake macro to find SDK for published s3 bucket

* [#93](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/93) - Restore the style of the OSApp on Windows

* [#90](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/90) - Fix Download progress bar cleared when finished downloading

* [#89](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/89) - Enable MP builds and link to ruby lib for bindings (Windows)

* [#88](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/88) - Improve reporting for Import SDD Xml file to include Logger errors/warnings 

* [#86](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/86) - Fix need to showControls when switching tabs 

* [#84](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/84) - Fix Refrigeration Grid should be declared unavailable for all but "Refigeration"

* [#82](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/82) - Fix purge on Facility > Shading subtab should delete empty shading surface groups and shading surfaces without groups

* [#75](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/75) - Application can now use the OpenStudio SDK to build vs having to build the submodule first, which simplifies the build process.

* [#73](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/73) - Fix Blacked Out User Selection within Dropdown Menus on Ubuntu 

* [#72](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/72) - Add Fan:SystemModel to OpenStudioApplication 

* [#69](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/69) - Fix Sketchup 2019 plugin for Mac osx

* [#61](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/61) - Fix crash in Schedule tab

* [#60](https://github.com/NREL/OpenStudioApplication/pull/60) - Support holidays in schedule GUI


## Issue Statistics Since Previous Release

* 47 new issues were filed since 2020-01-01 (not including opened pull requests)

* 34 issues were closed since the 2020-01-01
